Texts.Cookie.Title: Cookie Policy
Texts.Cookie.Section1.Body: This cookie policy explains how cookies and similar technologies are used by OrderXChange ("we" or "us") on our websites and other online services (like applications, portals or other services that use cookies).
Texts.Cookie.Section2.Title: What are cookies and why do we use them?
Texts.Cookie.Section2.Body1: Cookies are small text files stored in your browser’s memory by our websites. They are commonly used to support various functions on our websites.
Texts.Cookie.Section2.Body2: Cookies do other very useful jobs, such as tell us which pages you visited the most, understand how effective our website has been to you, and improve our communication to you on our products and services.
Texts.Cookie.Section2.Body3: We do not use cookies to collect information that directly identifies you as an individual. However, some information collected by cookies may be treated as personal data (such as your browsing history, or your device information).
Texts.Cookie.Section2.Body4: Depending on the job the cookie needs to perform, it may be a session or persistent cookie:
Texts.Cookie.Section2.Persistent: Persistent cookies are retained on your device until you either erase them or your browser erases them when the cookie reaches its expiration date.
Texts.Cookie.Section2.Session: Session cookies are temporary and expire once you close your browser or once your session ends.
Texts.Cookie.Section3.Title: What type of cookies do we use?
Texts.Cookie.Section3.Body: We only use the "Strictly Necessary" cookies on our website to improve user experience and these cookies are required to effectively run the website.
Texts.Cookie.Section3.Description.Antiforgery: Helps prevent Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks.
Texts.Cookie.Section3.Description.Xsrf: Ensures visitor browsing-security by preventing cross-site request forgery. This cookie is essential for the security of the website and visitor.
Texts.Privacy.Title: Privacy Policy
Texts.Privacy.Section1.Title: Privacy Notice
Texts.Privacy.Section1.Intro: This privacy notice for OrderXChange ("Company," "we," "us," or "our"), describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share ("process") your information when you use our services ("Services"), such as when you:
Texts.Privacy.Section1.Bullet1: Visit our website, or any website of ours that links to this privacy notice
Texts.Privacy.Section1.Bullet2: Engage with us in other related ways, including any sales, marketing, or events
Texts.Privacy.Section1.Questions: Questions or concerns? Reading this privacy notice will help you understand your privacy rights and choices. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our Services. If you still have any questions or concerns, please contact us at __________.
Texts.Privacy.Section2.Title: Summary of Key Points
Texts.Privacy.Section2.Point1: What personal information do we process? When you visit, use, or navigate our Services, we may process personal information depending on how you interact with OrderXChange and the Services, the choices you make, and the products and features you use.
Texts.Privacy.Section2.Point2: Do we process any sensitive personal information? We do not process sensitive personal information.
Texts.Privacy.Section2.Point3: Do we receive any information from third parties? No, we don't.
Texts.Privacy.Section2.Point4: How do we process your information? We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent. We process your information only when we have a valid legal reason to do so.
Texts.Privacy.Section2.Point5: What are your rights? Depending on where you are located geographically, the applicable privacy law may mean you have certain rights regarding your personal information.
Texts.Privacy.Section3.Title: 1. What Information Do We Collect?
Texts.Privacy.Section3.Subtitle: Personal information you disclose to us
Texts.Privacy.Section3.Body: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us.
Texts.Privacy.Section4.Title: 2. HOW DO WE PROCESS YOUR INFORMATION?
Texts.Privacy.Section4.Body: We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent.
Texts.Privacy.Section5.Title: 3. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
Texts.Privacy.Section5.Body: In some regions, such as the European Economic Area (EEA), United Kingdom (UK), and Canada, you have rights that allow you greater access to and control over your personal information. You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time.
Texts.Privacy.Section6.Title: 4. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
Texts.Privacy.Section6.Body: If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may email us at __________.
Texts.Privacy.Section7.Title: 5. HOW CAN YOU REVIEW, UPDATE, OR DELETE THE DATA WE COLLECT FROM YOU?
Texts.Privacy.Section7.Body: Based on the applicable laws of your country, you may have the right to request access to the personal information we collect from you, change that information, or delete it. To request to review, or delete your personal information, please visit the personal data page.
